vecHighlight.strDescription: Listen to most of the codec conversations.
Defeat 100 enemies in DL-Story-01: Brazilian Wind's Story Mode using Quick Draw.
Complete DL-Story-01: Brazilian Wind on Revengeance difficulty in one hour or less.
Defeat Sen. Armstrong without taking any damage on Hard difficulty or above.
Complete DL-Story-02: Blade Wolf on Revengeance difficulty in one hour or less.
Destroy a total of 100 Heavily Armed Cyborgs during story mode.
Successfully complete 10 No Kill battles during story mode.
Complete story mode on Revengeance difficulty with all S rankings.
Defeat Sen. Armstrong without taking any damage on Hard difficulty or above.
Defeat Samuel without taking any damage on Hard difficulty or above.
Defeat Sundowner without taking any damage on Hard difficulty or above.

data: [[235460,[["ACH_DWARF_RAIDEN",{"strName":"Dwarf Raiden","strDescription":"Incapacitate all the soldiers in File R-02 using a Dwarf Gekko.","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/235460/2ca3059f8d8c9ed8435a339a184d35334205acf6.jpg","flAchieved":29.299999237060547,"strID":"ACH_DWARF_RAIDEN"}],["ACH_WALK_DARK",{"strName":"A Walk in the Dark","strDescription":"Complete the abandoned railroad sequence in File R-03 without using AR Mode.","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/235460/ac8ca8d35c265bab61067e82b460f48fd263db9a.jpg","flAchieved":9.800000190734863,"strID":"ACH_WALK_DARK"}]]]]

data.strFullDescription:
Developed by Kojima Productions and PlatinumGames, METAL GEAR RISING: REVENGEANCE takes the renowned METAL GEAR franchise into exciting new territory with an all-new action experience. The game seamlessly melds pure action and epic story-telling that surrounds Raiden – a child soldier transformed into a half-human, half-cyborg ninja who uses his High Frequency katana blade to cut through any thing that stands in his vengeful path!

A huge success on both Xbox 360® and PlayStation®3, METAL GEAR RISING: REVENGEANCE comes to PC with all the famed moves and action running within a beautifully-realised HD environment.

This new PC version includes all three DLC missions: Blade Wolf, Jetstream, and VR Missions, in addition to all customized body upgrades for Raiden, including: White Armor, Inferno Armor, Commando Armor, Raiden’s MGS4 body, and the ever-popular Cyborg Ninja.

"CUTSCENES" option added to the Main Menu. Play any and all cutscenes.

"CODECS" option added to the Main Menu. Play all and any codec conversation scenes.

Menu option added to the CHAPTER Menu enabling user to play only the Boss battles.

"GRAPHIC OPTIONS" added to the OPTIONS Menu. Modify resolution, anti-aliasing, etc.
                There is an option reading "ZANGEKI" that will modify the amount of cuts you can make.
